languages.text: "Мы потеряли часть арсенала и сопутствующие отсеки, Лорд-капитан. Ложные приказы, отправленные с мостика, были незамедлительно выполнены. Никто даже не подумал о том, чтобы поразмыслить над ними хотя бы минуту — привычка к неукоснительному послушанию привела к беде. Последовавшие взрывы уничтожили большую часть боеприпасов и весь обслуживающий персонал, а также повредили прилегающие палубы".

"We lost some of the armoury and its auxiliary bays, Lord Captain. The false orders sent from the bridge were carried out to the letter. No one even stopped to consider them — it was the ingrained habit of rigorous obedience that led to disaster. The subsequent explosions obliterated most of the ordnance and service personnel, and also damaged the adjacent decks."
languages.original_text: "Мы потеряли часть арсенала и сопутствующие отсеки, Лорд-капитан. Ложные приказы, отправленные с мостика, были незамедлительно выполнены. Никто даже не подумал о том, чтобы поразмыслить над ними хотя бы минуту — привычка к неукоснительному послушанию привела к беде. Последовавшие взрывы уничтожили большую часть боеприпасов и весь обслуживающий персонал, а также повредили прилегающие палубы".

traits.locale_text: "We lost some of the armory and its auxiliary chambers, Lord Captain. The false orders sent from the bridge were carried out to the letter. Nobody even stopped to think about them — it was the habit of rigorous obedience that led to disaster. The following explosions obliterated most of the ordnance and service personnel, as well as damaged the adjacent decks."

"We lost some of the armory and its auxiliary chambers, Lord Captain. The false orders sent from the bridge were carried out to the letter. Nobody even stopped to think about them — it was the habit of rigorous obedience that led to disaster. The following explosions obliterated most of the ordnance and service personnel, as well as damaged the adjacent decks."

"We lost some of the armoury and its auxiliary bays, Lord Captain. The false orders sent from the bridge were carried out to the letter. No one even stopped to consider them — it was the ingrained habit of rigorous obedience that led to disaster. The subsequent explosions obliterated most of the ordnance and service personnel, and also damaged the adjacent decks."

No one even stopped to consider them — it was the ingrained habit of rigorous obedience that led to disaster. The subsequent explosions obliterated most of the ordnance and service personnel, and also damaged the adjacent decks."

"We lost some of the armoury and its auxiliary bays, Lord Captain. The false orders sent from the bridge were carried out to the letter. No one even stopped to consider them — it was the ingrained habit of rigorous obedience that led to disaster. The subsequent explosions obliterated most of the ordnance and service personnel, and also damaged the adjacent decks."

languages.text: “我们失去了一部分军备库与辅助船舱，舰长大人。那些从舰桥发出来的伪造命令得到了严格执行，甚至根本没人停下来考虑过这些命令是否符合常理。正是这种根深蒂固的服从习惯，才导致了这场灾难。随后，船上发生了爆炸，绝大部分军械与机组人员都在爆炸中灰飞烟灭，邻近的甲板区域也遭到了损坏。”
languages.original_text: "We lost some of the armoury and its auxiliary bays, Lord Captain. The false orders sent from the bridge were carried out to the letter. No one even stopped to consider them — it was the ingrained habit of rigorous obedience that led to disaster. The subsequent explosions obliterated most of the ordnance and service personnel, and also damaged the adjacent decks."

traits.locale_text: “我们失去了一部分军备库与辅助船舱，舰长大人。那些从舰桥发出来的伪造命令得到了严格执行，甚至根本没人停下来考虑过这些命令是否符合常理。正是这种根深蒂固的服从习惯，才导致了这场灾难。随后，船上发生了爆炸，绝大部分军械与机组人员都在爆炸中灰飞烟灭，邻近的甲板区域也遭到了损坏。”

languages.text: «Hemos perdido parte de la armería y sus bahías auxiliares, Lord Capitán. Las órdenes falsas enviadas desde el puente se han ejecutado al pie de la letra. Nadie se ha parado a cuestionarlas, la costumbre de obedecer rigurosamente ha provocado este desastre. Las explosiones sucesivas han destruido la mayor parte del armamento y al personal de servicio, además de causar daños extensos a las cubiertas adyacentes».
languages.original_text: "We lost some of the armoury and its auxiliary bays, Lord Captain. The false orders sent from the bridge were carried out to the letter. No one even stopped to consider them — it was the ingrained habit of rigorous obedience that led to disaster. The subsequent explosions obliterated most of the ordnance and service personnel, and also damaged the adjacent decks."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos perdido parte de la armería y sus bahías auxiliares, Lord Capitán. Las órdenes falsas enviadas desde el puente se han ejecutado al pie de la letra. Nadie se ha parado a cuestionarlas, la costumbre de obedecer rigurosamente ha provocado este desastre. Las explosiones sucesivas han destruido la mayor parte del armamento y al personal de servicio, además de causar daños extensos a las cubiertas adyacentes».

languages.text: "Wir haben einen Teil der Waffenkammer und ihrer Hilfsschächte verloren, Herr Kapitän. Die falschen Befehle, die von der Brücke geschickt wurden, wurden buchstabengetreu ausgeführt. Niemand dachte auch nur daran, sie zu überdenken — es war die tief verwurzelte Gewohnheit des rigorosen Gehorsams, die zur Katastrophe führte. Die anschließenden Explosionen löschten den größten Teil des Geschützes und des Bedienungspersonals aus und beschädigten auch die angrenzenden Decks."
languages.original_text: "We lost some of the armoury and its auxiliary bays, Lord Captain. The false orders sent from the bridge were carried out to the letter. No one even stopped to consider them — it was the ingrained habit of rigorous obedience that led to disaster. The subsequent explosions obliterated most of the ordnance and service personnel, and also damaged the adjacent decks."

traits.locale_text: "We lost some of the armoury and its auxiliary bays, Lord Captain. The false orders sent from the bridge were carried out to the letter. No one even stopped to consider them — it was the ingrained habit of rigorous obedience that led to disaster. The subsequent explosions obliterated most of the ordnance and service personnel, and also damaged the adjacent decks."

languages.text: « Nous avons perdu l'armurerie et ses baies auxiliaires, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les faux ordres envoyés depuis la passerelle ont été suivis à la lettre. Personne ne s'est posé la moindre question, et l'obéissance inconditionnelle de l'équipage nous a menés à la catastrophe. Les explosions ont anéanti l'essentiel du personnel affecté à ces services et aux munitions, et endommagé les ponts adjacents. »
languages.original_text: "We lost some of the armoury and its auxiliary bays, Lord Captain. The false orders sent from the bridge were carried out to the letter. No one even stopped to consider them — it was the ingrained habit of rigorous obedience that led to disaster. The subsequent explosions obliterated most of the ordnance and service personnel, and also damaged the adjacent decks."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons perdu l'armurerie et ses baies auxiliaires, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les faux ordres envoyés depuis la passerelle ont été suivis à la lettre. Personne ne s'est posé la moindre question, et l'obéissance inconditionnelle de l'équipage nous a menés à la catastrophe. Les explosions ont anéanti l'essentiel du personnel affecté à ces services et aux munitions, et endommagé les ponts adjacents. »

languages.text: 「戦団武具庫とその予備ベイの一部を失いました、ロード・キャプテン。ブリッジから送られた誤った命令が、そのまま実行されてしまいました。誰も一瞬止まって考えもしなかったのです。どこまでも従うという根深い習慣が災いを招きました。その後に爆発が起き、兵器と兵士の大部分が失われて、隣接するデッキも被害を受けました」
languages.original_text: "We lost some of the armoury and its auxiliary bays, Lord Captain. The false orders sent from the bridge were carried out to the letter. No one even stopped to consider them — it was the ingrained habit of rigorous obedience that led to disaster. The subsequent explosions obliterated most of the ordnance and service personnel, and also damaged the adjacent decks."

traits.locale_text: 「戦団武具庫とその予備ベイの一部を失いました、ロード・キャプテン。ブリッジから送られた誤った命令が、そのまま実行されてしまいました。誰も一瞬止まって考えもしなかったのです。どこまでも従うという根深い習慣が災いを招きました。その後に爆発が起き、兵器と兵士の大部分が失われて、隣接するデッキも被害を受けました」

languages.text: "Cephaneliğin bir kısmını ve destek bölümlerini kaybettik Lord Kaptan. Köprüden gönderilen hatalı emirler harfi harfine yerine getirilmiş. Kimse durup bu emirleri sorgulamamış. Felakete yol açan şey, kökleşmiş durumdaki kesin itaat alışkanlığı. Ardı ardına yaşanan patlamalar, savaş gereçlerinin ve hizmet personelinin çoğunu yok ederken bitişik güvertelere de hasar verdi."
languages.original_text: "We lost some of the armoury and its auxiliary bays, Lord Captain. The false orders sent from the bridge were carried out to the letter. No one even stopped to consider them — it was the ingrained habit of rigorous obedience that led to disaster. The subsequent explosions obliterated most of the ordnance and service personnel, and also damaged the adjacent decks."
